meanings.definition: A slope or incline that goes upwards.
meanings.sent1: The hikers climbed the upslopes to reach the mountaintop.
meanings.sent2: The road twisted and turned as it followed the upslopes of the hill.
meanings.sent3: The kids had a fun time rolling down the upslopes of the grassy hill.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits lifted as she ascended the upslopes of success.
meanings.sent5: The upslopes of the ski slope offered a thrilling challenge for the skiers.

meanings.definition: To move or go up a slope that inclines upwards.
meanings.sent1: The car struggled to upslopes along the steep mountain road.
meanings.sent2: She carefully upslopes the stairs to her apartment on the third floor.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel quickly upslopes the tree trunk to escape the chasing cat.
meanings.sent4: His career upslopes steadily as he gains more experience in his field.
meanings.sent5: The river upslopes gently towards the waterfall, creating a soothing sound.
